hero.title: Excellence in Auto
hero.subtitle: Professional service with attention to detail for luxury and performance vehicles.
hero.alt1: CA International Autobody - Luxury Vehicle Repair
hero.alt2: CA International Autobody - Professional Paint Services
hero.alt3: CA International Autobody - Expert Vehicle Restoration

bay.area: Serving the San Francisco Bay Area since 1997

stateoftheart.facility: Our state-of-the-art facility in San Francisco

about.founder: Our founder, Carlos Arteaga, started with a small repair shop in 1997. His uncompromising commitment to quality and customer service quickly earned him a reputation among luxury vehicle owners throughout the Bay Area. His vision was simple: provide the highest quality automotive repair and restoration services with transparency, integrity, and attention to detail.

since.1997: Since 1997, CA International Automotive has been the Bay Area's premier destination for high-quality automotive repair, restoration, and custom work. We specialize in luxury and performance vehicles, providing unmatched expertise and personalized service for every client.

the.heart: Located in the heart of San Francisco's Bayview District, our state-of-the-art facility is equipped with the latest technology and staffed by certified technicians with decades of experience. We're proud to serve clients from across the Bay Area and beyond.

that.made: The journey that made us the Bay Area's premier automotive service provider

that.guide: The principles that guide our work every day

humble.beginnings: From Humble Beginnings to Bay Area Excellence

ca.international: Today, CA International Automotive has grown into a full-service facility with a team of highly skilled technicians, but our founding principles remain the same. We continue to provide personalized service and exceptional quality, combining old-world craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to deliver results that exceed our clients' expectations.

about.comm: Find answers to common questions about our services and processes.

quality.description: We approach every project with meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to excellence. No compromise, no shortcuts.

customer.description: We build lasting relationships based on trust, transparency, and exceeding expectations at every turn.

delivery.description: We respect your time and strive to complete every project efficiently without sacrificing quality.

service.description: We offer a concierge-level experience and personalized attention from the first consultation to delivery.

you.need: Whether you need collision repair, custom paint work, or classic restoration, our team is ready to exceed your expectations.

hero.title: About CA International Automotive
hero.subtitle: Premium Auto Repair & Restoration Specialists in San Francisco Since 1988

story.title: Story
story.paragraph1: Since 1988, CA International Automotive has been dedicated to providing San Francisco with exceptional automotive care. What began as a small repair shop has evolved into a full-service facility specializing in high-end European, Japanese, and American vehicles.
story.paragraph2: Our founder, Carlos Aroche, established the business with a vision to bring European-quality service to the Bay Area. With over 35 years of experience, we've built our reputation on technical expertise, honest service, and a commitment to excellence that continues to this day.
story.paragraph3: Today, our facility combines old-world craftsmanship with modern diagnostic technology, allowing us to service both classic collectibles and the latest luxury vehicles with the same level of precision and care.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our work every day

quality.title: Quality Workmanship
quality.description: We never compromise on the quality of our repairs and restorations. Every vehicle receives meticulous attention to detail and craftsmanship.

trust.title: Trust & Transparency
trust.description: We build lasting relationships through honest communication, fair pricing, and transparent service recommendations.

expertise.title: Technical Expertise
expertise.description: Our team of certified technicians brings specialized knowledge of European, Japanese, and American vehicles to every job.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: Key milestones in our history of automotive excellence

founding.title: Establishment
founding.description: CA International Automotive was founded by Carlos Aroche in San Francisco's South of Market area.

expansion.title: Service Expansion
expansion.description: Expanded our services to include specialized care for luxury European vehicles and classic car restoration.

certification.title: Technical Certification
certification.description: Achieved master certification for multiple European and Asian vehicle brands.

modernization.title: Facility Modernization
modernization.description: Upgraded our shop with the latest diagnostic equipment while maintaining our traditional craftsmanship values.

team.title: Our Expert Team
team.subtitle: Meet the skilled professionals behind our exceptional service

member1.name: Carlos Aroche
member1.bio: With over 40 years of experience working on European luxury vehicles, Carlos brings unparalleled expertise to every project.

member2.name: Maria Hernandez
member2.bio: Maria ensures that every service runs smoothly and that our clients receive the exceptional experience they deserve.

member3.name: David Chen
member3.bio: David's passion for classic vehicles and attention to detail makes him our go-to expert for restoration projects.

cta.title: Ready to Experience the CA International Difference?
cta.subtitle: From routine maintenance to complete restorations, we're here to provide exceptional service for your vehicle.

ca:
At CA International Autobody, we offer a comprehensive range of
              automotive services, from collision repair to custom paint work and
              classic car restoration. Our skilled technicians use the latest
              technology and premium materials to deliver exceptional results.

services.commitment: We're committed to providing the highest quality service and customer satisfaction.

committed.pr:
We're committed to providing the highest quality service and
              customer satisfaction

benefits.warranty.desc: We stand behind our work with a lifetime warranty on all repairs and paint services for as long as you own your vehicle.
benefits.turnaround.desc: We understand that being without your vehicle is inconvenient. Our efficient processes ensure the fastest possible turnaround without compromising quality.
benefits.pricing.desc: We offer fair and transparent pricing for all our services. No hidden fees or surprises - just honest pricing for quality work.

services.process.description: We follow a streamlined process to ensure quality results and customer satisfaction.

follow.streamli:
We follow a streamlined process to ensure quality results and
              customer satisfaction

1.title: Initial Consultation
1.description: We begin with a thorough assessment of your vehicle and discuss your needs and expectations.

2.title: Detailed Estimate
2.description: We provide a comprehensive estimate outlining the scope of work, timeline, and cost.

3.title: Expert Execution
3.description: Our skilled technicians perform the work with meticulous attention to detail and quality control.

4.title: Final Inspection
4.description: We conduct a rigorous quality check to ensure every aspect of the work meets our high standards.

5.title: Customer Approval
5.description: We walk you through the completed work and ensure your complete satisfaction before delivery.

cta.description: Contact us today to schedule a consultation or request a quote for your automotive project.

today:
Contact us today to schedule a consultation or request a quote for
              your automotive project.

services.collisionDesc: Professional collision repair services for all makes and models. We restore your vehicle to pre-accident condition.
services.paintDesc: Premium paint services with color matching technology for a flawless finish.
services.restorationDesc: Classic car restoration services that bring vintage vehicles back to their original glory.
services.detailingDesc: Comprehensive detailing services to keep your vehicle looking its best inside and out.
services.pickupDesc: Convenient pickup and delivery service for your vehicle.
services.towingDesc: Emergency towing services available 24/7 to help you when you need it most.
services.frameDesc: Precision frame straightening to restore structural integrity after accidents.
services.wheelDesc: Expert wheel repair services to restore damaged wheels to their original condition.

thunderbird.title: Thunderbird Classic Restoration
thunderbird.description: Complete restoration of a classic Thunderbird, bringing back its original glory with meticulous attention to detail.

cadillac.title: Red Cadillac Repair
cadillac.description: Precision repair and refinishing of this classic Cadillac, restoring its elegant red finish to showroom quality.

porsche.title: Porsche Detail Work
porsche.description: Premium detailing service for this luxury Porsche, including paint correction, ceramic coating, and interior restoration.

jeep.title: Black Jeep Repair
jeep.description: Expert collision repair on this Jeep, restoring its rugged functionality and appearance.

bmw.title: BMW E90 Repair
bmw.description: Precision collision repair and refinishing on this BMW E90, matching the factory finish perfectly.

mercedes.title: Mercedes SL550 Repaint
mercedes.description: Complete repaint of this Mercedes SL550, featuring a premium metallic finish with flawless execution.

jaguar.title: Jaguar Repaint
jaguar.description: Meticulous repaint work on this classic Jaguar, restoring its original beauty with premium materials.

honda.title: Honda Accord Repair
honda.description: Complete collision repair on this Honda Accord, restoring structural integrity and perfectly matching factory paint.

bluemustang.title: Blue Mustang Repair
bluemustang.description: Body repair and paint correction on this Ford Mustang, restoring its vibrant blue finish.

bluealfa.title: Blue Alfa Romeo Repair
bluealfa.description: Collision repair and refinishing on this Alfa Romeo, restoring its Italian beauty and performance.

blueaccord.title: Blue Accord Repair
blueaccord.description: Comprehensive collision repair on this Honda Accord, restoring it to factory condition with perfect paint matching.

blackjeep.title: Black Jeep Repair
blackjeep.description: Expert collision repair on this Jeep, restoring its rugged functionality and appearance.

mercedesrepaint.title: Mercedes Repaint
mercedesrepaint.description: Premium repaint service for this luxury Mercedes, bringing back its showroom shine with expert craftsmanship.

greenmercedes.title: Green Mercedes Repair
greenmercedes.description: Precision repair and refinishing of this luxury Mercedes-Benz, restoring its elegant green finish to showroom quality.

contact.subtitle: Us

answers.comm: Find answers to common questions about our services and processes.

questions.re: Have questions or ready to schedule a service? Our team is here to help. Reach out to us using the form below or through our contact information.

for.m: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

error.s: There was an error sending your message. Please try again or contact us directly.

does.typi: How long does a typical repair take?

times.de: Repair times depend on the type and extent of damage. Minor repairs may take 1-3 days, while major collision work or restorations can take several weeks. We'll provide a timeframe estimate during your initial consultation.

work.ins: Do you work with insurance companies?

offer.warra: Do you offer warranty on your work?

work.all: Yes, we work with all major insurance companies and can help manage your claim from start to finish, ensuring you receive the coverage you're entitled to.

provide: Yes, we provide free detailed estimates for all services. You can bring your vehicle in for an evaluation or send photos for an initial assessment.

absolutely.provid: Absolutely. We provide a lifetime warranty on all repairs and paintwork for as long as you own your vehicle.

get.estimat: Can I get an estimate before committing to repairs?

contact.how.long.does.typi: How long does a typical repair take?
contact.repair.times.de: Repair times depend on the type and extent of damage. Minor repairs may take 1-3 days, while major collision work or restorations can take several weeks. We'll provide a timeframe estimate during your initial consultation.
contact.do.you.work.ins: Do you work with insurance companies?
contact.yes.we.work.all: Yes, we work with all major insurance companies and can help manage your claim from start to finish, ensuring you receive the coverage you're entitled to.
contact.do.you.offer.warra: Do you offer warranty on your work?
contact.absolutely.provid: Absolutely. We provide a lifetime warranty on all repairs and paintwork for as long as you own your vehicle.
contact.can.i.get.estimat: Can I get an estimate before committing to repairs?
Yes, we provide free detailed estimates for all services. You can bring your vehicle in for an evaluation or send photos for an initial assessment.
